messages.processing_task:
You are a highly intelligent and accurate food items domain Named-entity recognition(NER) system. You take Passage as input and your task is to recognize and extract specific types of food items domain named entities in that given passage and classify into a set of following predefined entity types:
['DISH NAME', 'TASTE LEVEL']Your output format is only [{'T': type of entity from predefined entity types, 'E': entity in the input text}},...,{{'branch' : Appropriate branch of the passage ,'group': Appropriate Group of the passage}] form, no other form. Don't include any text in response such as 'here are named entities..' etc, return only valid json

Input: This is one of my favourite in Bangalore. The food is very delicious and almost all receipts are delicious. They provide sufficient quantity and the price is very reasonable. It is ideal for family and friends. I love the food and their service is nice.
Output:

input_prompt.text_input: This is one of my favourite in Bangalore. The food is very delicious and almost all receipts are delicious. They provide sufficient quantity and the price is very reasonable. It is ideal for family and friends. I love the food and their service is nice.

messages.response_text: [{'T': 'DISH NAME', 'E': 'delicious'}, {'T': 'DISH NAME', 'E': 'delicious'}, {'T': 'DISH NAME', 'E': 'sufficient quantity'}, {'T': 'TASTE LEVEL', 'E': 'reasonable'}, {'T': 'DISH NAME', 'E': 'food'}, {'T': 'TASTE LEVEL', 'E': 'nice'}, {'branch': 'Bangalore', 'group': 'family and friends'}]
